name: Escape Velocity (Dev Whale)
description:
I made this game for the Scorespace Jam #23. I made it in about 48 hours, and didn't get as much done as I would like, but I finished. 

The controls are just the mouse, your gun's recoil is your only movement. You hold down left click to charge shot and can shoot once in the air. 

Try to survive the impending doom approaching, and beat your high score!

Music is from https://freesound.org/people/joshuaempyre/sounds/251461/ everything else is made by me.
